recipesJson.name: Root Beer Float
recipesJson.author: Jazzy_girl
recipesJson.description:
This tastes exactly like an A & W root beer float!!  Its a snv and when it steeps the flavors get more creamy and keeps that great root beer n ice cream flavors!
 Defiantly a must mix if you love root beer floats!!!  My recipe is inspired by Ken on ELR.  
It needs no sweetener b'cuz its sweet like float!!! All I can say is this is delicious!!
